title: Send Webflow form data to Google Sheets
author: Giovanni Ruggieri
workflow_json:
{"nodes":[{"id":"096a8e0c-8f72-40fb-aa1e-118fb33a3916","name":"Prepare Fields","type":"n8n-nodes-base.code","position":[1740,860],"parameters":{"jsCode":"const formData = $input.all()[0].json.payload.data
const Date = $input.all()[0].json.payload.submittedAt || new Date()

return {
  ...formData, // creates a new field for every element inside formData
  Date
}

  
"},"notesInFlow":false,"typeVersion":2},{"id":"c98bb655-aa79-447f-897d-56ba9640073b","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[1660,780],"parameters":{"color":2,"width":270,"height":250,"content":"1 line of code to take the data object (adding date as a plus)"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"05a27975-ac48-48db-9c82-c9658a8d14c2","name":"Sticky Note2","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[1260,640],"parameters":{"color":6,"width":267,"height":394,"content":"Make sure to disable legacy API

![](https://imgur.com/0tebypt.png)"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"59d25f8e-bc9d-43ac-9c4b-3013f81c3e3d","name":"Sticky Note3","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[2040,760],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":270,"height":274,"content":"Automatically create column names and append data (works even on empty test"}},"credentials":{"googleSheetsOAuth2Api":{"id":"QkZbOZMXiUKxATjx","name":"Google Sheets account 2"}},"typeVersion":4.5},{"id":"01a09112-930c-493a-b16c-660e4dc3d272","name":"Sticky Note4","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[260,160],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":520,"height":1680,"content":"## Self-hosted N8N users only:

### How to get Client ID and Client Secret

- From your Webflow dashboard go to "Apps & Integrations"
![](https://imgur.com/IX2ruVB.png)

- Look for "App development" and click "Create an App"
![](https://imgur.com/J0be6lz.png)

- Fill the fields and click "Continue"
![](https://imgur.com/Uiwo7vp.png)

- Inside "Building blocks" enable REST API, insert your "Redirect URL" from N8N, enable form access and click "Create App"
![](https://imgur.com/lf8Xv7R.png)
![](https://imgur.com/5yyex2U.png)

- Copy and paste Client ID and Client Secret to N8N and connect


"},"typeVersion":1}],"pinData":{},"connections":{"Prepare Fields":{"main":[[{"node":"Append New Row","type":"main","index":0}]]},"On Form Submission":{"main":[[{"node":"Prepare Fields","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
readme:
## Send Webflow form data to Google Sheets ğŸš€

### How It Works

This workflow connects your Webflow form submissions to Google Sheets with **style and efficiency**. Here's the magic in action:

  1. **Form Submitted** ğŸ‰ â€“ A Webflow form submission triggers the flow.
  2. **Fields Prepared** ğŸ› ï¸ â€“ Data gets organized, and a submission date is added.
  3. **Data Logged** ğŸ“‹ â€“ Your data finds a cozy new home in Google Sheets.



* * *

### Set-Up Steps

â±ï¸ **Estimated Time:** 5-10 minutes

  1. **Connect Webflow** ğŸŒ â€“ Hook up your Webflow account and disable legacy APIs (instructions inside the workflow).
  2. **Set Up Google Sheets** ğŸ§¾ â€“ Choose your spreadsheet and authenticate.
  3. **You're Ready!** ğŸ’« â€“ Let the workflow take it from here.



* * *

### Why You'll Love It â¤ï¸

  * **No More Manual Copy-Paste:** Save time and keep data clean.
  * **Smart Field Mapping:** Automatically creates columns and fits your data.
  * **Helpful Notes Along the Way:** Friendly tips guide you through setup like a pro.



* * *

Enjoy the smooth ride from Webflow to Google Sheets! ğŸš€

Send Webflow form data to Google Sheets ğŸš€

How It Works

This workflow connects your Webflow form submissions to Google Sheets with style and efficiency. Here's the magic in action:

  1. Form Submitted ğŸ‰ â€“ A Webflow form submission triggers the flow.
  2. Fields Prepared ğŸ› ï¸ â€“ Data gets organized, and a submission date is added.
  3. Data Logged ğŸ“‹ â€“ Your data finds a cozy new home in Google Sheets.

Set-Up Steps

â±ï¸ Estimated Time: 5-10 minutes

  1. Connect Webflow ğŸŒ â€“ Hook up your Webflow account and disable legacy APIs (instructions inside the workflow).

Enjoy the smooth ride from Webflow to Google Sheets! ğŸš€
